00018 #ifndef _TDUMP_H
00019 #define _TDUMP_H
00020 
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <math.h>
00023 #include <list>
00024 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <fstream>
00027 
00028 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00029 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00030 
00031 #include <votca/csg/trajectorywriter.h>
00032 
00033 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00034 
00044 class Tdump : public QMCalculator
00045 {
00046 public:
00047     Tdump() {};
00048     ~Tdump() {};
00049 
00050     const char *Description() { return "Outputs the coarse-grained and back-mapped (using rigid fragments) trajectories"; }
00051 
00052     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00053     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00054     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00055    
00056 private:
00057     Property * _options;
00058     string _nameCG, _nameQM;
00059     TrajectoryWriter *_writerCG, *_writerQM; 
00060 };
00061 
00062 inline void Tdump::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options) {
00063     _options = options;
00064     if ( options->exists("options.tdump.cg") && 
00065           options->exists("options.tdump.qm") ) {
00066         _nameCG = options->get("options.tdump.cg").as<string>();
00067         _nameQM = options->get("options.tdump.qm").as<string>();
00068         cout << "Writing the  conjugated  segments trajectory to " << _nameCG <<endl;
00069         cout << "Writing the backmapped atomistic trajectory to " << _nameQM <<endl;
00070     } else {
00071         _nameCG="traj_cg.pdb";
00072         _nameQM="traj_qm.pdb";
00073         cout << "Warning: at least one of the trajectory names was not given" << endl
00074                 << "Using default names traj_cg.pdb and traj_qm.pdb" << endl;
00075     }
00076     
00077     string extCG  = _nameCG.substr(_nameCG.length()-4,4);
00078     string extQM  = _nameCG.substr(_nameQM.length()-4,4);
00079 
00080     _writerCG = TrjWriterFactory().Create(_nameCG);
00081     if(_writerCG == NULL) throw runtime_error(string("output format not supported: ")+ extCG);
00082 
00083     _writerQM = TrjWriterFactory().Create(_nameQM);
00084     if(_writerQM == NULL) throw runtime_error(string("output format not supported: ")+ extQM);
00085 
00086     _writerCG->Open(_nameCG);
00087     _writerQM->Open(_nameQM);
00088 
00089 }
00090 
00091 inline bool Tdump::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top) {
00092     
00093      // dumping the coarse-grained trajectory
00094     _writerCG->Write( top );
00095     
00096     // creating the back-mapped atomistic trajectory
00097     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00098     Topology qmAtomisticTop;
00099     qmAtomisticTop.setBox(top->getBox());
00100     qmAtomisticTop.setStep(top->getStep());
00101     qmAtomisticTop.setTime(top->getTime());
00102 
00103 
00104     for (vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl = lcharges.begin(); itl != lcharges.end(); itl++){
00105         top->AddAtomisticBeads(*itl,&qmAtomisticTop);
00106     }
00107     
00108     // dumping the back-mapped trajectory and cleaning
00109     _writerQM->Write(&qmAtomisticTop);
00110     
00111     qmAtomisticTop.Cleanup();
00112 
00113     return true;
00114 }
00115 
00116 inline void Tdump::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top)
00117 {
00118     _writerCG->Close();
00119     _writerQM->Close();
00120 }
00121 
00122 }}
00123 
00124 #endif  /* _TDUMP_H */
